transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello haji ha boliye
Customer: abhi clear hai point mam ha clear hai boliye
Executive: mam mai ye keh rahi hu mai jaha se bhi diet agencies ke naam se jo aapki business listing hai india mart pe
Customer: diet agency kya hai
Executive: diet agency ki jo mam listing hai india mart head office se baat kar rahi hu mai
Customer: ha boliye india mart pe mam catalog service chal rahi hai na do you know
Customer: wo frizzle madam dekh rahe hai hum khali order aur item add karte hai usme
Executive: okay okay no problem actually mam frizzle mam ne hi mujhe ye contact number diya tha last time office office ka number hai hum khali wo order aata hai na un customer ko handle karte hai aur jo item nahi rehta hai wo hum add karte hai usme
Executive: ji bilkul bilkul mam maine isi regarding hi aapko call kiya hai okay so jo bhi aapko india mart platform pe jin bhi customer ke mam calls aati hai wo aap hi dekhte ho
Customer: ha hum sab dekhte hai
Executive: okay okay okay actually mam mai aapko ye bata rahi hu ki meri last time baat hui thi usi number pe to kuch product bhi mujhe share kiye the na kisi aur se i think meri baat hui thi whatsapp pe unhone mujhe product ki photo vagera share kiye
Customer: ha ha humne hi kiye the
Executive: yes yes yes to maine matlab update kar diye the aapne check kiye catalog
Customer: ha dekha tha humne
Executive: okay okay to mai ye puch rahi hu mam ki abhi aap mujhe batayenge thoda agar aap buyleads vagera pe kaam kar rahe ho to kya response aa raha hai because last time thoda bahut issue aa raha tha na customer buyleads pe hai na
Customer: customer ka order aata hai lekin wo out of goa se aa raha hai jyadatar duri se aa raha hai unko khali ek do product chahiye rehta hai lekin wo hamare liye affordable nahi rehta hai na khali dispatchment ke liye fleet ka charges hi jyada rakhte hai isliye
Executive: okay to mam aapko mai guide kar deti hu aap mujhe bataoge application jo india mart ka hai aapke pass login hai
Executive: india mart application
Customer: ruko ruko ruko ji
Customer: ha boliye abhi
Executive: mam mai ye puch rahi hu india mart ka jo mobile application hai aap use karte ho
Customer: ha hai hamare pass login hai login hai login hai okay to aap ek kaam karo mai aapko guide kar rahi hu aap buylead open kijiye ek bar mai aapko bata deti hu kaise aap search kar sakte ho goa ki location ke liye
Customer: buyleads na ha buyleads pe click kijiye kiya hai
Executive: mam upar na aapko locations dikh rahi hongi right
Customer: location ha
Executive: hmm to aap jab locations pe alag alag city ka naam aa raha hoga right ha india all location yes
Executive: to aap usko thoda sa scroll karoge left side ko mam left side ki taraf thoda sa scroll kijiye waha pe search bar aa raha hoga search karne ke liye location type country state city search ke liye yes yes type kijiye aap goa
Customer: goa ha kiya kiya to niche aapko buyleads show ho rahi hai goa ka goa state in india goa city in goa aisa aa raha hai
Executive: ha aa raha hai na goa to ab aap wo wali buylead consume kar lijiye goa wali
Customer: goa state in india click karne ka hai but mam dekho abhi aapko na chote order bhi dikh rahi hai hai na order value kam hai right hmm
Executive: to location jo aapko location ka logo dikh raha hai na upar uske niche aapko bulk dikh raha hoga bracket me 25k ke plus dikh raha hoga aapko ha us pe click kijiye to mai abhi goa select karti hu theek hai
Customer: ha goa bhi select kijiye aur bulk order pe bhi click kijiye ye location me goa select karne ke baad kuch nahi aata hai
Executive: mam mujhe to show ho rahi hai goa goa ki abhi goa start kiya hai maine uske baad goa state india goa city in goa gola golpara city na aisa kuch dikha raha hai niche goa wala city in goa
Executive: aap ek bar na whatsapp check kijiye maine aapko whatsapp pe ye wali goa wali buylead abhi share ki hai ek bar aap whatsapp open kijiye ye wali buylead aapko show ho rahi hai
Customer: ruko ha check kar
Executive: kyuki maine jab goa pe click kiya to mujhe ye buylead show ho rahi hai
Executive: ye product hai i think aapka product ek bar aap check kijiye ye product
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: show ho rahi hai na mam aapko
Customer: baby diapers loose vagera dikha raha hai wo
Executive: ye wali buylead nahi dikh rahi aapne goa pe click karke mam goa pe click ha goa pe location me ja ke maine wo search button rehta hai udhar goa type kiya hai baad me goa me tick mark karke maine wo baby diapers loose vagera wo sab dikha raha hai
Executive: nahi nahi nahi wo hata do aap jo aapne category product pe click kiya hai na baby diapers to usko hata do aap kyuki abhi aapko na isme nahi baby diapers me buylead nahi show ho rahi hai ye dusre product ki hai okay hmm ha usko hata ke aap ek kaam karo jo maine aapko bulk bataya na location ke niche likha hua aa raha hoga bulk order us pe click kijiye location ke niche bulk order nahi dikha raha hai to mai photo bheju aapko kya dikha raha hai bhejiye
Executive: location ka logo aa raha hoga na mam red color me ha location ka logo aa raha hai uske bilkul niche bulk likha hua aa raha hoga 25k plus bracket me
Customer: lead lead type me bulk click karna hai yes
Customer: abhi kiya hai maine abhi show hua aapko ye to hamara product hai nahi to hamara product nahi hai ye wala product nahi hai aapka okay to aapke face mask hai hamare pass disposable surgical face mask hai
Executive: okay no problem no problem that is isko chod dijiye aap aap mujhe bataoge mam daily basis pe aap kitni bar mobile application aap open karke check karte ho buyleads ko buyleads ko ha buyleads kitni bar check karte ho aap ek din me kitne time se open karte ho application buyleads ke liye
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: kya keh rahe ho
Executive: mam aap ek kaam kar sakte ho mai aapko thoda sa suggest kar deti hu aapko aapko mai ek link share kar deti hu meeting ke liye because aapki jo already cities add hai na yaha pe goa ke alava aur bhi cities add hai to unko aap kaise remove karoge setting me ja ke wo mai ek bar bata deti hu so that aapko other cities ki buyleads na show ho okay okay to aapka mail id aap mujhe bata denge mail id officially yahi hai jo aapke profile me added hai
Customer: care tech na mail id ho gaya ha frizzle diet ke hi naam se hai mail id right diet frizzle hamare to care tech hai usi pe bhejo baad me hum frizzle madam ko bolte hai humko bhejne ke liye
Executive: to mai aapko whatsapp pe link share kar deti hu ek kaam kariye okay okay okay ek minute wait kijiye aap
Executive: whatsapp pe check kijiye mam okay isi link ko aap join kar lijiye mai video meeting se connect kar rahi hu aapko direct okay abhi hamara jane ka time ho gaya abhi kaise nahi ho sakta hai abhi nahi ho sakta to aap mujhe time bataoge kab mai connect karu mam kyuki aapko guide karna important hai
Customer: okay kal karo aap mai aapko timing batati hu kyuki hamara jo ordering rehta hai na medicine ka bidding rehta hai na to hum free time pe aapko call karke bata deti hu okay okay no problem aap whatsapp pe message drop kar dena okay mam okay okay thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer receives orders from outside Goa.

- Only one or two products are ordered.

- Fleet charges are too high.



Resolution:

- Executive guided customer on using IndiaMART app.

- Executive shared a WhatsApp link for meeting.

- Will guide on removing other cities from settings.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share a time to connect tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, goa, application, location, orders
